verses.verse: <S%H7971>Cast<s%> your <S%H3899>bread<s%> on the <S%H6440>surface<s%> of the <S%H4325>waters,<s%> for you will <S%H4672>find<s%> it after <S%H7230>many<s%> <S%H3117>days.<s%>

<S%H5414>Divide<s%> your <S%H2506>portion<s%> to <S%H7651>seven,<s%> or <S%H1571>even<s%> to <S%H8083>eight,<s%> for you do not <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H4100>what<s%> <S%H9567>misfortune<s%> may <S%H1961>occur<s%> on the <S%H776>earth.<s%>

<S%H518>If<s%> the <S%H5645>clouds<s%> are <S%H4390>full,<s%> they <S%H9553>pour<s%> out <S%H1653>rain<s%> upon the <S%H776>earth;<s%> and <S%H518>whether<s%> a <S%H6086>tree<s%> <S%H5307>falls<s%> toward the <S%H1864>south<s%> or toward the <S%H6828>north,<s%> <S%H4725>wherever<s%> the <S%H6086>tree<s%> <S%H5307>falls,<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> it <S%H1961>lies.<s%>
He who <S%H8104>watches<s%> the <S%H7307>wind<s%> will not <S%H2232>sow<s%> and he who <S%H7200>looks<s%> at the <S%H5645>clouds<s%> will not <S%H7114>reap.<s%>

<S%H9201>Just<s%> as you do not <S%H3045>know<s%> the <S%H1870>path<s%> of the <S%H7307>wind<s%> and how <S%H6106>bones<s%> [are formed] in the <S%H990>womb<s%> of the <S%H4392>pregnant<s%> <S%H4392>woman,<s%> <S%H3602>so<s%> you do not <S%H3045>know<s%> the <S%H4639>activity<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> <S%H6213>makes<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3605>things.<s%>

<S%H2232>Sow<s%> your <S%H2233>seed<s%> in the <S%H1242>morning,<s%> and do not be <S%H5117>idle<s%> <S%H3027><s%> in the <S%H6153>evening,<s%> for you do not <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H335>whether<s%> <S%H2088>morning<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> evening sowing will <S%H3787>succeed,<s%> or <S%H518>whether<s%> <S%H8147>both<s%> of them <S%H259>alike<s%> will be <S%H2896>good.<s%>
The <S%H216>light<s%> is <S%H4966>pleasant,<s%> and [it is] <S%H2896>good<s%> for the <S%H5869>eyes<s%> to <S%H7200>see<s%> the <S%H8121>sun.<s%>

<S%H3588>Indeed,<s%> <S%H518>if<s%> a <S%H120>man<s%> should <S%H2421>live<s%> <S%H7235>many<s%> <S%H8141>years,<s%> let him <S%H8055>rejoice<s%> in them <S%H3605>all,<s%> and let him <S%H2142>remember<s%> the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H2822>darkness,<s%> for they shall be <S%H7235>many.<s%> <S%H3605>Everything<s%> that is to <S%H935>come<s%> [will be] <S%H1892>futility.<s%>

<S%H8055>Rejoice,<s%> <S%H970>young<s%> <S%H970>man,<s%> during your <S%H3208>childhood,<s%> and let your <S%H3820>heart<s%> be <S%H3190>pleasant<s%> during the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H979>young<s%> <S%H979>manhood.<s%> And <S%H1980>follow<s%> the <S%H1870>impulses<s%> of your <S%H3820>heart<s%> and the <S%H4758>desires<s%> of your <S%H5869>eyes.<s%> Yet <S%H3045>know<s%> that <S%H430>God<s%> will <S%H935>bring<s%> you to <S%H4941>judgment<s%> for <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H428>things.<s%>

So, <S%H5493>remove<s%> <S%H3708>vexation<s%> from your <S%H3820>heart<s%> and <S%H5674>put<s%> <S%H5674>away<s%> <S%H9567>pain<s%> from your <S%H1320>body,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> <S%H3208>childhood<s%> and the <S%H7839>prime<s%> of <S%H7839>life<s%> are <S%H1892>fleeting.<s%>
